bill.summary:
Telemedicine Everywhere Lifting Everyone's Healthcare Experience And Long Term Health HSA Act of 2021 or the TELEHEALTH HSA Act of 2021
This bill makes permanent the preferred treatment of telehealth and other remote care services for purposes of health savings accounts.
